text:
Excited to share great news from our small team.
We’ve just been approved to be listed on HubSpot marketplace with an app WebPush. The app works as a dedicated solution for HubSpot to send push messages in a flexible and effortless way — in bulk or individually, to everyone or lists, automated and manually.

Check it out on HubSpot marketplace :point_down:
In case of any questions let me know. I’m here to help.

<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/live-chat/webpush>

Hey <@UDEASNWEB>
Hope things are going well for you.
In case you’re still interested in push notification solutions, we have our app listed on HubSpot marketplace.
Now it’s more mature with CRM lists, contacts, and workflows integrated.
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/live-chat/webpush>
Let me know if you need and further information or assistance. Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
